basic.floral_language:
Tradescantia zebrine
Floriography: tenacious, vitality, beautiful.
This plant is an evergreen herbaceous. It could crawling grow on the ground. Leaves are thick and beautiful long oval shaped with mixed green, white or purplish brown strips. It usually cultivated in pots to place in living room, desktop or drooping plant.
T. zebrine is a shade tolerant plant. Bright scatter light habitat is preferred. Direct sunlight should be avoided. Purple flowers may bloom in June to August if growing well.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers in June-August, purple flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green , purple, white in mixture

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Shade-tolerant plants, put places with bright scattered light, avoid sun exposure
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, may rub leaves with water when dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in the growing season, stop in winter
